name: Spirit Gorgons.  Steps Between Worlds
description:
Shadows cradle her face as she gazes upward through the veil of a black mantle — the silent breath before transformation.
From the forgotten stone staircase of an abandoned building, she descends like a memory reborn, each step pulling her deeper into the forest’s hidden myth.
This is not just movement — it is the Gorgon’s return, her rebirth into the realm between ruins and nature.

💎 Authenticity:
Every Spirit Gorgons NFT is an authentic performance art piece — imagined, performed, and captured entirely by the artist.
No stock media. No borrowed visuals. No AI mimicry.
Only original choreography, concept, and myth brought to life in motion.

Collection: Spirit Gorgons — "Rebirth of the Gorgon"
An expansive and evolving collection of unique NFT artworks inspired by mythological archetypes, dance, and ritual.
Each piece is an original creation — blending movement, symbolism, and storytelling to bring ancient myths into the digital realm.
New series and themed sets will be added regularly, expanding the world of "Rebirth of the Gorgon " and offering collectors fresh, immersive experiences.
